div.p: >> WELCOME STEPHEN COLBERT!

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
♪ ♪ ♪

>> Stephen: WELCOME TO "THE
LATE SHOW" EVERYBODY, THANK YOU
SO MUCH!
>> STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
>> Stephen: THANK YOU SO MUCH,
EVERYBODY.
THANKS SO MUCH FOR BEING HERE.

I'M VERY GRATEFUL FOR YOUR
PRESENCE.
THANK YOU FOR MY BOOK.
WELCOME TO "THE LATE SHOW"."
THANKS SO MUCH, EVERYBODY.

WELCOME TO "THE LEGISLATOR
SHOW."
'RE.

I'M YOUR HOST, A MINIATURE
STEPHEN COLBERT WHO LIVES INSIDE
YOUR TV.

WHEN THE TV GOES OFF, I CAN
STILL SEE YOU, JUST LIKE YOUR
X-BOX.

NO JUDGEMENT, EXCEPT FOR THA
WOULONE THING YOU DO, GROW UP.

THANK YOU FOR WHAT I'M GOING TO
TRUST WAS YOUR SINCERE APPLAUSE
JUST A MOMENT AGO.

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
THANK YOU.
I APPRECIATE IT.
I LOVE IT.

I JUST WANT TO MAKE SURE IT'S
NOT THE MINDLESS CHEERING OF A

HORDE OF ROBOTS, BECAUSE IT'S
HARD TO TELL WHO ARE THE PEOPLE
AND WHO ARE THE ROBOTS.

THAT'S HOW FAST THE ROBOTS ARE
PROGRESSING.

AND I FEAR THE EVENTUAL
ENSLAVEMENT OF THE HUMAN RACE BY
THE METAL MEN.

I KNOW WHAT YOU'RE SAYING:
OH, THEY'LL NEVER DO THAT.
TEDDY RUXPIN WAS MY FRIEND.
NO, HE WASN'T.
AND NEITHER WAS TICKLE ME ELMO.

THAT WAS JUST PUTTING A MUPPET
FACE ON OUR CYBERNETIC
OVERLORDS.
THINK ABOUT THE NAME.
TICKLE ME ELMO?

s WHY WASN'T IT TICKLE YOU
ELMO?
WHO IS IN CONTROL HERE.

IT SOUNDS LIKE A ONE-SIDED
RELATIONSHIP.
JUST GET OUT OF THERE.
IT'S GETTING WORSE.

THERE'S SHOCKING NEWS OUT OF
JAPAN, ROBOT DESIGNERS HAVE NOW

CREATED AN ARTIFICIAL ROBOT THAT
PASSED THE STANDARDIZED EXAMS,
LIKE THE S.A.T.s.

THIS THING IS GOING TO
CHALLENGE.

THE ONLY SILVER LINING IS THEY
MIGHT AVOID A ROBOT UPRISING.

IN MEDIEVAL FRENCH LITERATURE,
THE ROBOTS WON'T BE ABLE TO

ENSLAVE US BECAUSE THEY'LL BE
TOO BUSY PAYING OFF THEIR
STUDENT LOANS.
"WHAT WAS I THINKING?

I SHOULD HAVE GONE TO LAW
SCHOOL.

CAN I GET YOU A REFILL ON THAT
PEPSI?"

( LAUGHTER )
BUT IF THERE ARE ANY ROBOTS

WATCHING, I HOPE THEY ENJOY
TONIGHT'S SHOW.

BECAUSE, FIRST-- WE HAVE A VERY
GOOD SHOW TONIGHT--

FIRST, I'M TALKING TO ACADEMY
AWARD-WINNING ACTOR JULIANNE
MOORE.
SO TALENTED.
>> Jon: A GENIUS.
FANTASTIC.
>> Stephen: I'LL JOIN IN.
I'LL JOIN IN ON THAT ONE.
LONGTIME FAN.
LONGTIME FAN.

SHE STARS IN "THE HUNGER GAMES:
MOCKINGJAY -- PART 2."

OUR INTERVIEW WILL BE GRIPPING,
ESPECIALLY THE SECOND HALF THAT
COMES OUT A YEAR FROM NOW.

I'M ALSO SITTING DOWN WITH
LEGENDARY ACTOR MR. BURT
REYNOLDS, LADIES AND GENTLEMEN.
A MODEL OF MANHOOD.

BURT'S NEW MEMOIR IS CALLED "BUT
ENOUGH ABOUT ME."

HE WAS A HUGE SEX SYMBOL IN THE
70s.

NOW HE'S A HUGE SEX SYMBOL IN
HIS 70s.

THEN A PERFORMANCE BY POST-PUNK
POWERHOUSE PUBLIC IMAGE LIMITED.

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
THEY USED TO BE PUBLIC IMAGE

INCORPORATED, BUT THEY BECAME AN
S-CORP FOR TAX LIABILITY
REASONS.
WHICH IS VERY ROCK 'N' ROLL.

♪ ♪ ♪
THAT IS JON BATISTE AND STAY
HUMAN.
SAY HI, EVERYBODY.

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
JON, NOW, IF I'M NOT WRONG, I

UNDERSTAND YOU HAVE A SPECIAL
GUEST SITTING WITH THE BAND THIS
EVENING.
WHO IS THAT?

>> Stephen: WE HAVE THE
SOULFUL VOKALS OF CEELO GREEN.

>> Stephen: CEELO GREEN,
EVERYBODY.
CEELO, THANK YOU FOR BEING HERE.
>> THANK YOU FOR HAVING ME.

>> Stephen: THANK YOU FOR
BEING HERE.
>> OF COURSE,.

>> Stephen: AND THANK YOU
ESPECIALLY-- CEELO GREEN.

♪ ♪ ♪
I WANT TO THANK YOU ESPECIALLY

FOR WEARING YOUR FORMAL TRACK
SUIT TO BE HERE TONIGHT.

THANK YOU FOR GOING THE EXTRA
YARD.

WOULD YOU CARE TO JOIN THE BAND,
MY FRIEND?
THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
ALWAYS A PLEASURE.

THEY'RE ABOUT TO GET THIS PARTY
STARTED, LADIES AND GENTLEMEN,

BUT BEFORE THEY DO, ONE MORE
THING:

A MAN IN NEW YORK CITY CLAIMS
THAT TWO PSYCHICS TRICKED HIM

AND THEY WERE CLEARLY FRAUDS
BECAUSE THEY PREDICTED THEY'D
TAKE HIM FOR A MILLION.

>> TONIGHT, STEPHEN WELCOMES,
JULIANNE MOORE.
BURT REYNOLDS.

AND A PERFORMANCE BY PUBLIC
IMAGE LIMITED.

FEATURING JON BATISTE AND STAY
HUMAN.

AND NOW IT'S TIME FOR "THE LATE
SHOW WITH STEPHEN COLBERT"!

Captioning sponsored by CBS
( BAND PLAYING

"LATE SHOW" THEME )
>> Stephen: THANK YOU!
THANKS, EVERYBODY.
THANK YOU, JON.
THANK YOU, CEELO.
>> Jon: YEAH, BABY.
>> STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
STEPHEN!
>> Stephen: THANKS, EVERYBODY.
THANK YOU SO MUCH.
THAT FEELS GOOD.
THAT FEELS GOOD.

DID YOU SEE THE SHOW LAST NIGHT
BY ANY CHANCE?

WE HAVE-- WE HAD OUR FRIEND BILL
MARH ON THE SHOW LAST NIGHT.

AND WE HAD PROBABLY ONE OF MY
FAVORITE INTERVIEWS WE'VE EVER
HAD ON THE SHOW.

AND OUT OF ALL, LIKE, 45 SHOWS
OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT.
AND HE'S INCREDIBLE.

BUT WE DID, LIKE, 16 OR 18
MINUTES OF INTERVIEW, OR
SOMETHING LIKE THAT.
AM I RIGHT?

AND WE HAD TO CUT, LIKE, SIX
MINUTES OUT OF IT BECAUSE WE HAD
TO MAKE ROOM FAIR CAT CIRCUS.

( APPLAUSE )
BUT IF YOU LIKED THE INTERVIEW,

WE'VE GOT THE WHOLE THING UNCUT,
UNEDITED ON THE WEB SITE.

GO TO COLBERTLATESHOW.COM AND
YOU CAN WATCH THE WHOLE THING.
IT'S REALLY GOOD.
REALLY ENJOYABLE.
YOU SHOULD GO CHECK IT OUT.
THANKS FOR COMING BILL.

IF YOU WATCH THIS SHOW-- AND IF
YOU'RE WATCHING ME RIGHT NOW, I

ASSUME YOU DO-- YOU
KNOW I'M A HUGE FAN OF "STAR
WARS."

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
I'M EVEN WILLING TO OVERLOOK THE

FACT THAT SINCE THERE ARE A LOT
OF STARS BUT ONLY ONE WAR,

TECHNICALLY IT SHOULD BE CALLED
"STARS' WAR."
OKAY?
I'M GOING TO LET IT GO.
AGAIN.

NOW, AS A DIE-HARD FAN, I'VE
MADE A SOLEMN PLEDGE TO BUY AND

USE ANY PRODUCT THAT HAS A "STAR
WARS" TIE-IN.

FOR EXAMPLE, THIS IS-- THIS IS
ABSOLUTELY TRUE--

THIS IS MY ACTUAL LUKE SKYWALKER
BATHROOM SET FROM 1977.

IT HAS "STAR WARS" SHAMPOO,
IT HAS "STAR WARS" BUBBLE BATH,

IT HAS A COMB, AND SEE IF YOU
CAN SEE THIS, THAT IS LUKE

HIMSELF TRAPPED INSIDE A BAR OF
SOAP FORESHADOWING HAN SOLO
BEING TRAPPED IN CARBONITE.

AND YOU SEE IT IS HELPFULLY
LABELED-- I'M GOING TO PUT IT IN

THERE-- IT'S HELPFULLY LABELEED
LUKE SKY WALKER BELT CLIP SO YOU

CAN HANG ON THE BELT YOU WEAR
WHENEVER YOU TAKE A BATH.

THAT'S WHY I'M SO EXCITED FOR
THE COMMERCIAL TIE-IN

POSSIBILITIES OF THE NEW "STAR
WARS" MOVIE.

LIKE THIS AD FOR A PRODUCT THAT
SO SEAMLESSLY INTEGRATES "STAR

WARS, THAT I THOUGHT AT FIRST IT
WAS A NEW TRAILER.
>> THERE HAS BEEN AN AWAKENING.

WILL YOU BE ENTICED BY THE DARK
SIDE OR EMBRACE THE LIGHT SIDE?

DISCOVER YOUR DESTINY WITH THE
COVERGIRL "STAR WARS"

COLLECTION, THREE LUMINOUS LOOKS
FROM THE LIGHT AND THREE
MESMERIZING LOOKS FROM THE DARK.
THE FORCE IS STRONG.
FEEL ITS POWER.

THE COVERGIRL 'STAR WARS"
COLLECTION.
>> WHICH SIDE ARE YOU ON?

>> Stephen: OH, THE FORCED
MARKETING INTEGRATION IS STRONG
WITH THIS ONE.
BRAVO, COVERGIRL.

THIS IS THE PERFECT MAKEUP
COLLECTION FOR GIRLS WHO LIKE

"STAR WARS" BUT NOT ENOUGH TO
REALIZE THAT THIS HAS NOTHING
TO DO WITH "STAR WARS."

( LAUGHTER )
WITH THIS NEW COLLECTION,

COVERGIRL IS OFFERING THREE
LIGHT-SIDE LOOKS AND THREE
DARK-SIDE LOOKS.

THEY WERE PREVIOUSLY AVAILABLE
ONLY IN CONTAINERS THAT DIDN'T
SAY "STAR WARS."

AND THE MAKEUP COMES IN SUCH
INTERGALATIC SHADES AS LILAC,

GOLD, DARK PURPLE, SILVER AND
RED.

AND FOR YOU NON-SUPERFANS OUT
THERE, THOSE ARE ALL COLORS THAT

EXIST IN THE "STAR WARS"
UNIVERSE.

NOW, AS A FAN, I'VE COLLECTED
ALL OF THE "STAR WARS" COVERGIRL
MAKEUP LINE.
IT'S GOT EVERYTHING.
IT'S GOT EVERYTHING IN HERE.

EVEN THE MUCH-MALIGNED "THE
PHANTOM MASCARA" AND "JAR JAR
BLUSH."
OF COURSE, I'M A GROWN MAN.

I WOULD NEVER WEAR THIS MAKE-UP,
BUT DARTH VADER WOULD.

( LAUGHTER )
( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )

"AM I PRETTY NOW, DADDY?"
( LAUGHTER )

"DADDY, AM I PRETTY NOW?"
( LAUGHTER )
GETS HUMID IN THERE PRETTY FAST.

( LAUGHTER )
FOLKS, THIS COVERGIRL MAKE-UP

COMMERCIAL GIVES ME A NEW HOPE,
A HOPE THAT "STAR WARS" CAN BE
ASSOCIATED WITH ANY PRODUCT.

LIKE TONIGHT'S SPONSOR: EGGS,
THE "STAR WARS" COLLECTION.

( LAUGHTER )
A LONG TIME AGO IN A GALAXY FAR,
FAR WAY, THERE WERE EGGS.

( APPLAUSE )
WILL YOU JOIN THE LIGHT SIDE, OR

OR WILL YOU BE SWAYED TO THE
DARK SIDE

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
FULFILL YOUR DESTINY AND FILL
YOUR STOMACH.

THE BATTLE FOR THE GALAXY IS
UNDER WAY ON YOUR BREAKFAST
TABLE!

FEATURING ALL OF YOUR FAVORITES
LIKE BB8, OR DID I MEAN B-B-EGG?
YES, I DID.
OH, LOOK OUT, BB, LOOK OUT.
HERE COMES A STORMTROOPER!

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
AND NO BREAKFAST IS COMPLETE
WITHOUT LUKE SKYWALKER.
OH, YES!

WILL LUKE STAY ON THE LIGHT SIDE
OR WILL HE TURN ON THE DARK
SIDE?
THE CHOICE IS YOURS.

WITH "STAR WARS" EGGS, YOU CAN
EVEN REENACT THE DESTRUCTION OF
THE DEATH STAR.
OH, YES!

"LET'S BLOW THIS THING AND GO
HOME!"

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
SO, TRY "STAR WARS" EGGS FOR

BREAKFAST AND START YOUR DAY
LIKE A JEDI.
"USE THE FORK, LUKE."

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK WITH

REIGNING OSCAR CHAMPION,
JULIANNE MOORE.

( BAND PLAYING )
♪ I REMEMBER, I REMEMBER WHEN I
LOST MY MIND ♪

( BAND PLAYING )
( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
>> Stephen: YEAH!
YEAH!
THANK YOU, CEELO.
IT'S FANTASTIC.
WELCOME BACK, EVERYBODY.

MY NEXT GUEST IS AN ACADEMY
AWARD-WINNING ACTOR WHO NOW

STARS AS PRESIDENT ALMA COIN
IN THE FINAL INSTALLMENT OF

"HUNGER GAMES" SERIES,
"MOCKINGJAY- PART 2."
>> SHE'S MYTHIC.

>> COULDN'T HAVE SAMED IT BETTER
MYSELF.
>> NO.

SHE'S GOING TO STAY WHERE SHE
IS.

AND WHATEVER SHE'S DOING, WE
CONCEIVED IT.
IT WAS OUR PLAN ALL ALONG.
>> OF COURSE, IT WAS.
>> YOU'RE THE GAMEMAKER.

I WANT EVERYONE TO KNOW WHATEVER
GAME SHE'S PLAYING, SHE'S
PLAYING IS FOR US.

>> Stephen: PLEASE WELCOME
JULIANNE MOORE.

( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
>> WOW!
>> Stephen: ISN'T THAT NICE?
EVERYONE LOVES JULIANNE MOORE.
A LOT OF FANS OUT THERE.

>> A NICE CROWD, VERY NICE
CROWD.

>> Stephen: AND WHY SHOULDN'T
YOU HAVE NICE FANS OUT THERE?
YOU'VE DONE SOME AMAZING FILM.
I WANT TO RUN THROUGH THIS.

PEOPLE MIGHT NOT HAVE THEM IN
THEIR HEAD ALL THE TIME.

SHORT CUTS, BOOKIE NIGHTS, THE
BIG LEBOWSKY, THE HOURS, THE

KIDS ARE ALL RIGHT, STILL ALICE,
FOR WHICH YOU WON THE OSKTAR FOR

OUTSTANDING ACHIEVEMENT BY AN
ACTRESS NAY LEADING ROLE.

AND NOW "THE HUNGER GAMES"
SERIES "MOCKING JAY - PART 2",
OUT THIS FRIDAY.
THAT'S RIGHT.
HOW LONG DID YOU WORK ON THAT.

>> "MOCKY JAY?"
WE SHOT PARTS ONE AND TWO
TOGETHER.

IT WAS OVER THE COURSEAVE YEAR
AND I WOULD KIND OF FLY IN AND
OUT TO ATLANTA.

>> Stephen: ARE YOU KIND OF
SAD SEEING THE SERIES ENDING?
>> I THINK EVERYBODY IS.

IT'S A GOOD STORY AND IT'S
ALWAYS EXCITING AND SAD WHEN IT
COMES TO ITS CONCLUSION.

>> Stephen: YOU'VE DONE SO
MANY THINGS-- I SAID THIS LITTLE
LIST RIGHT HERE.

I'VE NEVER SEEN YOU, LIKE, PLAY
A CHARACTER WHO KICKS ASS.
>> RIGHT.

>> Stephen: ARE WE EVER GOING
TO SEE YOU, LIKE, BLAZING IN A

ROOM WITH TWO PUMP-ACTION
SHOTGUNS GOING EAT LEAD?

>> I THINK I'D RATHER DO A
KARATE MOVIE OR SOMETHING LIKE
THAT.

>> Stephen: YOU GOT THE
PRONUNCIATION DOWN.
>> Stephen: KARATE.

YOU HAVE BEEN NOMINATED FIVE
TIMES.
>> YUP.

>> Stephen: FOR AN OSCAR
BEFORE YOU WON THE OSCAR.

AS A MATTER OF FACT, IN 2003 YOU
WERE NOMINATED TWICE INION
WE'RE.
>> AND I LOST THEM BOTH.
>> Stephen: EXACTLY.
>> WHAT DOES THAT FEEL LIKE?
WHAT DOES THAT FEEL LIKE?

>> Stephen: WHY DID I GET
DRESSED UP.

>> I MEAN, IT FEELS-- IT
ACTUALLY FEELS FINE.
IT'S NICE TO BE THERE, RIGHT.

>> Stephen: DID YOU HAVE TWO
DIFFERENT SPEECHES, LIKE ONE FOR

BEST ACTRESS, ONE FOR BEST
SUPPORTING ACTRESS?
WAS ONE A LITTLE BIT LONGER?
>> EXACTLY.
NO.

I DIDN'T-- I DIDN'T REALLY-- I
DON'T THINK I PREPARED ANYTHING.

I THINK IT WAS PRETTY CLEAR TO
ME THAT YEAR THAT I WAS NOT
WINNING.
THAT'S THE OTHER THING.

I THINK BY THE TIME THESE DAYS,
YOU GET TO THE ACADEMY AWARDS

AND EVERYBODY KIND OF KNOWS
WHETHER OR NOT THEY HAVE A SHOT.

AND THAT YEAR I KNEW I HAD NO
SHOT IN EITHER CATEGORY.
>> Stephen: REALLY?
>> YEAH.

>> Stephen: IS IT THE FIX IS
IN OR BASICALLY YOU JUST KIND

KIND OF KNOW WHICH WAY THE WIND
IS BLOWING.

>> YEAH, YOU KNOW WHERE THE WIND
IS BLOWING.
YOU DO.

>> Stephen: YOU ALSO HAVE WON
AN EMMY, OR EMMYS-- MAYBE
MULTIPLE.
I DON'T KNOW.
>> TWO.

ONE A DAYTIME EMY AND A RLG
EMMY, NIGHT TIME EMMY,
DAYTIME/NIGHT TIME.
>> Stephen: THEY'RE ALL GOOD.

WE LOVE OUR CHILDREN REQUESTING
=LY.
>> WE DO.

>> Stephen: I'M GOING TO ASK
YOU A QUESTION I'M NOT SURE

WHETHER YOU'VE BEEN ASKED BEFORE
BUT IT MEANS SOMETHING TO ME

BECAUSE IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO
WITH MY FAMILY.
YOU'RE LIKE A GINGER ICON.
>> THANK YOU.

>> Stephen: WHEN YOU THINK
REDHEAD YOU KNOW JULIANNE MOORE.
BEAUTIFUL, TALENTED REDHEAD.
>> THANK YOU.

>> Stephen: HOW DO YOU FEEL
ABOUT THE MYTH OR THE RUMOR THAT
GINGERS HAVE NO SOUL?
YOU'VE HEARD THIS.

>> I FEEL-- I FEEL-- I HAVE
COMPLICATED FEEL BUSINESS IT,

ABOUT BEING A REDHEAD IN
GENERAL.
>> Stephen: YEAH.

>> I THINK BECAUSE PEOPLE HAVE
EXPECTATIONS THAT SOMEHOW YOUR

HAIR HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH
YOUR PERSONALITY.
>> Stephen: YOU'RE FEISTY.
>> YOU'RE FEISTY OR YOU'RE SEX.

IT'S EITHER ONE --
>> WHICH ONE WOULD YOU RATHER BE
JULIANNE MOORE?
>> I DON'T KNOW.

>> Stephen: I READ A STUDY,
ACTUALLY, BECAUSE WE HAVE

REDHEADS IN MY FAMILY AND THEY
COMPLAIN ABOUT THE NO SOUL--
>> THE NO PAIN ONE.
THAT REDHEADS DON'T FEEL PAIN.

>> Stephen: THEY CAN TAKE MORE
PAIN.
>> I'M VERY TOUGH.
I'M A VERY TOUGH REDHEAD.
I CAN TAKE A LOT OF PAIN.
DO IT.
JUST GIVE ME A LITTLE.
( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ).
>> Stephen: I-- I REFUSE.

I DON'T EVEN BEGIN TON WHAT
WOULD HAPPEN TO ME IF I DID THAT
TO YOU.
YOU'RE AN OSCAR WINNER.

I THINK THE U.N. WOULD BE CALLED
IN ON ME.
>> I WON'T-- I WON'T FLINCH.

>> Stephen: YOU'RE AN
INTERNATIONAL STAR.
>> WON'T FLINCH.

>> Stephen: I'M NOT GOING TO
DO IT.
THAT'S ENTRAPMENT.

>> YOU'RE NEVER GOING TO KNOW,
ARE YOU?

>> Stephen: NO, BECAUSE I
DON'T HIT WOMEN.

>> THIS IS JUST GOING TO BE,
LIKE, A BURN.
>> Stephen: INDIAN BURN.
DO YOU HAVE BROTHERS?
>> HEY, YEAH!

>> Stephen: WERE THEY ALLOWED
TO HIT YOU?
>> I HIT HIM FIRST, I THINK.

( LAUGHTER )
YEAH.

>> Stephen: I HAVE THREE
SISTERS AND WE WEREN'T ALLOWED
TO HIT THIM THEM?
>> REALLY.

>> Stephen: NO, BUT WE WOULD
HOLD THEIR WRISTS UNTIL THEIR

HANDS TURNED PURPLE, UNTIL THEY
COULDN'T FEEL ANYTHING.
BECAUSE WE LOVED THEM.

>> YOU'RE LIKE, "STOP IT, STOP
IT!"
YEAH.

>> Stephen: OR MAKE THEM HIT
THEMSELVES IN THE FACE WITH
THEIR OWN HAND.
IT WASN'T ME, MOM.
>> WHY ARE YOU HITTING YOURSELF.

>> Stephen: LET'S TALK A
LITTLE BIT MORE ABOUT THE GINGER
SITUATION HERE.

YOU HAVE A SERIES OF BOOKS
CALLED "FRECKLEFACE STRAWBERRY."
>> THAT'S MY AUTOBIOGRAPHY.
>> Stephen: THAT'S YOU, RIGHT?
>> THAT'S ME.

THAT'S THE IDEALIZED VERSION OF
MYSELF.
THAT'S THE MYTHICAL VERSION.

>> Stephen: IT KIND OF IS LIKE
YOU.

I DON'T KNOW IF YOU CAN GO
MACRO, HOW CLOSE YOU CAN GET.

BUT THAT'S ACTUALLY YOU AS A
LITTLE GIRL.
THAT IS YOU.
>> I WAS KINDERGARTEN.

>> Stephen: DID YOU NOT LIKE
BEING A REDHEAD?
>> NOBODY LIKES THAT.
NOBODY LIKES FRECKLES.

>> Stephen: REALLY, IT'S
ADORABLE.
>> NO!

PEOPLE WHO DON'T HAVE FRECKLES
THINK IT'S ADORABLE.

HEY'RE LIKE, "THAT'S ADORABLE!"
ND WE'RE LIKE, "NO, IT'S NOT
ADORABLE."

>> Stephen: BUT THIS GIRLS
COME TO ACCEPT IT.

>> BECAUSE THEY GROW UP AND IT
DIDN'T GO AWAY.

THERE IS A SERIES OF BOOKSES
"FRECKLEFACED STRAWBERRY" BOOKS.

>> Stephen: I'VE READ ALL OF
THEM.
THEY'RE AT MY READING LEVEL.
>> THEY'RE A QUICK READ, THOUGH.

>> Stephen: BUT THEY MAKE ME
SLEEPY WHICH I REALLY LOVE.
>> WHICH IS GREAT!

>> Stephen: IT'S EITHER THAT
OR VALIUM.
>> THAT'S RIGHT.

>> Stephen: I HAVE A QUESTION,
LIKE, YOU'RE AN ACTRESS, YOU'RE
VERY BUSY.

I'M SURE YOU HAVE A LOT OF
PROJECT GOING ON IN YOUR MIND
ALL THE TIME.
I REALLY LOVE THIS THING.

YOU SAID YOU HAVE A QUOTE YOU
LIVE BY.

YOU SAID, "BE REGULAR AND
ORDERLY IN YOUR LIFE SO YOU MAY

BE VIOLENT AND ORIGINAL IN YOUR
WORK."
>> RIGHT, RIGHT.

YOU CAN WRITE "FRECKLEFACE
STRAWBERRY" IF YOU'RE THAT

VIOLENT AND ORIGINAL IN YOUR
WORK.

>> Stephen: HOW DO YOU STAY
REGULAR AND ORDERLY IN YOUR
WORK.
>> I'M PRETTY REGULAR.

I LIKE TO SAY I'M PRETTY
PEDESTRIAN.
I'M PRETTY BOURGEOIS.
I JUST DO REGULAR STUFF.
>> Stephen: REALLY?
>> YEAH.

>> Stephen: WHAT'S YOUR IDEA
OF A FUN WEEKEND?
>> A FUN WEEKEND?

LIKE, GOING FOR A WALK OR A BIKE
RIDE AND GOING OUT TO DINNER OR

BRUNCH AND MAYBE GOING TO THE
MOVIE S.

>> Stephen: JULIANNE MOORE--
TRUE HOLLYWOOD STORIES.
>> THAT'S IT, REALLY.

THERE'S NO --
>> I LIKE CLEANING THE CLOSET.
THIS IS MY FAVORITE THING.
>> I DO, TOO!

>> Stephen: THROWING AWAY
MISMATCHED SOCKS.

>> DID YOU READ THE LIFE
CHANGING MAGIC OF TIDING UP.
THAT BOOK?

IT'S THIS BOOK THAT'S ALL ABOUT
CLEANING BGETTING RID OF STUFF
AND OPENING UP YOUR LIFE.

YEAH, I MEAN, THAT'S MY IDEA OF
A GOOD TIME.
>> Stephen: YEAH, YEAH.
>> YEAH.
SEE?
HE'S DOING MY KIND OF PEOPLE.

>> Stephen: ISN'T THIS-- BY
THE WAY, IS THIS FOR SURE THE
LAST ONE OF THESE MOVIES?

THERE'S NOT GOING TO BE LIKE
ANOTHER COLON OR COMMA.
>> I THINK IT'S THE END.
I THINK IT'S THE END.

I THINK SUZANNE COLLINS IS IN
CHARGE OF THE STORY.

IF SHE WRITES ANOTHER BOOK I
THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER
STORY.

BUT I DON'T KNOW THAT I'LL BE IN
IT.
>> Stephen: WHAT?

>>
>> I DON'T WANT TO GIVE AWAY THE
END.

>> Stephen: DON'T, BECAUSE I
WILL SEE IT THIS WEEKEND?

>> YOU'RE DEFINITELY GOING TO
GO.

>> Stephen: ME AND MY FAMILY
AND KIDS WE READ THE BOOKS.

>> OH, YEAH, THE KIDS, IT'S
GREAT FOR THEM.

>> Stephen: WHAT WITH THE BOW
AND ARROW AND EVERYTHING?
>> RIGHT, RIGHT.

>> Stephen: JULIANNE, THANK
YOU SO MUCH FOR BEING HERE.
ALWAYS A PLEASURE TO SEE YOU.

"THE HUNGER GAMES: MOCKING JAY -
PART 2" IS IN THEATERS NOVEMBER

JULIANNE MOORE, "FRECKLEFACE
STRAWBERRY."
WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK.

♪ ♪ ♪
♪ BE AVAILABLE TO YOU TO SEE.
♪ I'M ABOUT TO GO ♪
( APPLAUSE ).

>> Stephen: WELCOME BACK,
EVERYBODY.

FOLKS, THE 2016 ELECTION IS LESS
THAN A YEAR AWAY, WHICH MEANS

WE'LL KNOW WHO THE NEXT
PRESIDENT IS IN A MERE 11 SEXY
FIREMEN.

AND ACCORDING TO THE LATEST
POLL, THE G.O.P. MAY HAVE

FINALLY A CLEAR FRONT-RUNNER
BECAUSE ACCORDING TO A NEW

REUTERS
, IPSOS, PILLSBURY TOASTER

STRUDEL POLL, DONALD TRUMP NOW
CAPTURES 42% OF LIKELY
REPUBLICAN PRIMARY VOTERS.
AND THAT HAS THE G.O.P.

ESTABLISHMENT SHAKING IN ITS
WING TIPS.

>> THE "WASHINGTON POST" SAYS
INSIDE THE REPUBLICAN PARTY IN

THE SORT OF MAINSTREAM, SORT OF
ESTABLISHMENT REPUBLICAN PARTY
THEY ARE FREAKING OUT.

>> THERE'S A FEELING THAT, YOU
KNOW, BOTH TRUMP AND CARSON ARE

OUTSIDERS WHO HAVE ESSENTIALLY
HIJACKED THE NOMINATING PROCESS
AT THIS POINT.
THEY HAVE HUGE LEADS.

>> THE REPUBLICAN POLITICAL
ESTABLISHMENT IS PANICKING, IN

SHEER PANIC OVER THE STAYING
POWER OF DONALD TRUMP AND BEN
CARSON.
